remarks.div: The gender of a person used for adminstrative purposes (as opposed to clinical gender)

member.name: T:MARC.Everest.Sherpas.Templates.Sandbox.Vocabulary.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Sherpas Generated Vocabulary for Sandbox: EKG Report CDA Document version 2013-02-10T12:52:00

remarks.div:
Sandbox: Electrocardiogram Report as a Minimal CDA Document
This is the sandbox as a playgroup to test ART-DECOR, derived from a minimal CDA Release 2 document based on a real use case of an Electrocardiogram Report of a patient (see The ART-DECOR demo3 example).
Please note that all changes to this project will be overwritten every day at 0300 Coordinated Universal Time UTC
